column4: my network admin made me remove dropbox from my ubuntu desktop because he said it is owned by a hacker orginization and every file that is uploaded is read, and they look for bank account info, passwords and network setup info? Any truth to that at all?
He also said it was using 90% of the networks resources
Dropbox may be actively backing up in the background so you might want to check the settings and turn off any auto-options
